author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Valeant To Redeem $150 Mln Aggregate Principal Amount Of Outstanding 6.375% Senior Unsecured Notes Due 2020
text:
April 12 (Reuters) - Valeant - Once Notes Have Been Redeemed, Valeant’s Total Long :
* VALEANT ANNOUNCES REDEMPTION OF $150 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF ITS OUTSTANDING 6.375% SENIOR UNSECURED NOTES DUE 2020
* VALEANT - ONCE NOTES HAVE BEEN REDEEMED, VALEANT’S TOTAL LONG-TERM DEBT WILL BE APPROXIMATELY $25.4 BLN Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
